channel.title: Area's of view planned layout:
channel.description:
World: Use the absolute coordinates. Chunk: uses the region chunk coords and approx coords.
World: will hold the lists of everything such as dropped items and npcs chunk: will load the npcs in view and what not.
chunk Classes: The same idea as packet handling except it would use a class based on the region coords. these classes would hold area specific things such as doors only being openable if you have a key and what not. will reduce lag, all other servers just use the absolute coords for everything.

item.title: Area's of view planned layout:
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

World: Use the absolute coordinates.
Chunk: uses the region chunk coords and approx coords.

World: will hold the lists of everything such as dropped items and npcs
chunk: will load the npcs in view and what not.

chunk Classes: The same idea as packet handling except it would use a class based on the region coords. these classes would hold area specific things such as doors only being openable if you have a key and what not.
will reduce lag, all other servers just use the absolute coords for everything.
